description: Students who are pursuing an Individual Major, in consultation with their IMP advisor, may register for this fall semester course, which is graded P/N. This optional course is generally used for research and other preparation for the work planned for the spring semester. Whether students are enrolled in IM 391 or another approved level III course or experience, senior project plans must be submitted to IMP by the end of September. Prerequisite: permission of the IMP.
name: Senior Project I
